languages.text: "Что же, господин ван Калокс, в таком случае с сожалением объявляю, что вы извергнуты из рядов Святой Инквизиции и обвиняетесь в пособничестве врагу Империума. Благодарю за службу, и прощайте".

"In that case... Heinrix van Calox, in the name of the Emperor, I hereby revoke your Inquisitorial privileges and declare you Excommunicate Traitoris. The punishment for your heresy is death. I bid you farewell."
languages.original_text: "Что же, господин ван Калокс, в таком случае с сожалением объявляю, что вы извергнуты из рядов Святой Инквизиции и обвиняетесь в пособничестве врагу Империума. Благодарю за службу, и прощайте".

traits.locale_text: "Well, sir van Calox, in that case, I regret to inform you that you are hereby banished from the ranks of the Saint Inquisition and are charged with complicity to the enemy of the Imperium. I thank you for your service and bid you farewell."

"Well, sir van Calox, in that case, I regret to inform you that you are hereby banished from the ranks of the Saint Inquisition and are charged with complicity to the enemy of the Imperium. I thank you for your service and bid you farewell."

"Well, Sir van Calox, then, I regret to inform you that you are hereby banished from the ranks of the Holy Inquisition and are charged with complicity to the enemy of the Imperium. Thank you for your service and farewell to you."

"Well, Sir van Calox, then, I regret to inform you that you are hereby banished from the ranks of the Holy Inquisition and are charged with complicity to the enemy of the Imperium. Thank you for your service and farewell to you."

"In that case, Master van Calox, I regret to inform you that you are hereby banished from the ranks of the Holy Inquisition and charged with conspiring with enemies of the Imperium. I thank you for your service and bid you farewell."

"In that case... Heinrix van Calox, in the name of the Emperor, I hereby revoke your Inquisitorial privileges and declare you Excommunicate Traitoris. The punishment for your heresy is death. I bid you farewell."

languages.text: « Dans ce cas... Heinrix van Calox, au nom de l'Empereur, je vous retire vos privilèges d'inquisiteur et vous déclare Excommunicate Traitoris. Votre hérésie sera punie par la mort. Adieu. »
languages.original_text: "In that case... Heinrix van Calox, in the name of the Emperor, I hereby revoke your Inquisitorial privileges and declare you Excommunicate Traitoris. The punishment for your heresy is death. I bid you farewell."

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, maître van Calox, je suis au regret de vous informer que vous êtes banni des rangs de la Sainte Inquisition et accusé de complicité avec les ennemis de l'Imperium. Je vous remercie de vos services et vous dis adieu. »

languages.text: «En ese caso... Heinrix van Calox, en nombre del Emperador, por la presente le eximo de sus privilegios inquisitoriales y le declaro Excommunicate Traitoris. La pena por su herejía es la muerte. Adiós».
languages.original_text: "In that case... Heinrix van Calox, in the name of the Emperor, I hereby revoke your Inquisitorial privileges and declare you Excommunicate Traitoris. The punishment for your heresy is death. I bid you farewell."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, señor van Calox, en ese caso, lamento informarle de que queda expulsado de las filas de la Santa Inquisición y está acusado de confabular con los enemigos del Imperium. Gracias por sus servicios y adiós».

languages.text: “既然如此……海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯，以帝皇之名，我在此撤销你身为审讯官的所有特权，将你以叛徒的身份逐出审判庭。你犯下了异端邪说恶行，必须判处死刑，永别了。”
languages.original_text: "In that case... Heinrix van Calox, in the name of the Emperor, I hereby revoke your Inquisitorial privileges and declare you Excommunicate Traitoris. The punishment for your heresy is death. I bid you farewell."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，冯·卡洛克斯大师，我很遗憾地通知你，你已经被正式驱逐出了审判庭的行列，审判庭指控你与帝国之敌沆瀣一气。感谢你的服务，永别了。”

languages.text: "Nun, Heinrix van Calox ... dann entziehe ich Euch hiermit im Namen des Imperators Eure Privilegien als Mitglied der Inquisition verhänge Excommunicate Traitoris gegen Euch. Die Strafe auf Ketzerei ist der Tod. Lebt wohl."
languages.original_text: "In that case... Heinrix van Calox, in the name of the Emperor, I hereby revoke your Inquisitorial privileges and declare you Excommunicate Traitoris. The punishment for your heresy is death. I bid you farewell."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, Sir van Calox, dann muss ich Euch leider mitteilen, dass Ihr hiermit aus den Reihen der Heiligen Inquisition ausgeschlossen und wegen Komplizenschaft mit dem Feind des Imperiums angeklagt werdet. Danke für Eure Dienste und lebt wohl."

languages.text: 「その場合…ハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックス、皇帝の名において、ここに貴公の異端審問官としての特権を解消し、そなたを反逆者として破門する。異端の罪に対する刑罰は死だ。さらばだ」
languages.original_text: "In that case... Heinrix van Calox, in the name of the Emperor, I hereby revoke your Inquisitorial privileges and declare you Excommunicate Traitoris. The punishment for your heresy is death. I bid you farewell."

traits.locale_text: 「さて、ヴァン・カロックス卿、このようなことを君に告げるのは残念だが…君を神聖なる異端審問庁より追放し、帝国の敵に加担した罪をもって告発する。これまでの奉仕に感謝しよう。そして、さらばだ」

languages.text: "Pekâla o zaman... Heinrix van Calox, İmparator adına Engizisyon ayrıcalıklarını elinden alıyor ve seni İhanet Aforozu'na mahkûm ediyorum. Kâfirliğinin cezası ölümdür. Elveda."
languages.original_text: "In that case... Heinrix van Calox, in the name of the Emperor, I hereby revoke your Inquisitorial privileges and declare you Excommunicate Traitoris. The punishment for your heresy is death. I bid you farewell."
